General.Name: Protektor S.A.
General.Description: Protektor S.A. engages in the production, distribution, and sale of protective, work, and military footwear in Europe, Asia, Africa, and South America. It offers safe footwear for protection against various of threats, such as mechanical injuries, chemical injuries, moisture, burns, and other harmful effects of temperature; occupational footwear for everyday use in the workplace to protect feet against injuries; and heavy footwear for firemen, army, police, and other special uniformed services, as well as security companies and hobbyists. The company sells its products under the PROTEKTOR and ABEBA brands. Protektor S.A. was founded in 1944 and is based in Lublin, Poland.

3.Name: Mr. Marek  Mlotek-Kucharczyk
3.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Member of Supervisory Board
